text.headline: Higher Dimension Fragment
text.text: Higher Dimension Fragment passes through the Earth; Dolaris gets four-dimension ability for a short time.

events.display_date: Magic Age[[br]]4:00 PM May 3, 1453 [[dash]] 9:00 PM May 28, 1453

text.headline: Ye Wenjie's Father and Her Sister Die
text.text: Ye Wenjie's father and her sister die in the Great Proletarian Cultural Revolution.

text.headline: Ye Sends Message to Space
text.text: Ye sends radio waves to the space using the solar amplifier.

text.headline: Trisolarans Receive Message
text.text:
The No.1379 Trisolaran Listener receives and decodes the message sent by Ye. It replies and warns humans that do not reply this message.

Trisolarans know the existence of humans.

text.headline: Ye Replies
text.text: Ye receives the reply from the Trisolaran Listener; then she replies again.

text.headline: Yang dong Is Born
text.text: Ye's daughter Yang dong is born.

text.headline: The First Trisolaris Fleet Is Launched
text.text: The First Trisolaris Fleet is launched towards the direction of the transmission of the signal sent by Ye.

text.headline: The First Trisolaris Fleet towards the Earth
text.text:
Trisolarans receive the reply from Ye; then they adjust the direction of the fleet towards the Earth.

Sophon project is launched.

text.headline: ETO Is Established
text.text: Earth-Trisolaris Organization (ETO) is established. Ye is the lead.

text.headline: Sophons Are Made
text.text: Trisolarans make four Sophons using hydrogen nuclei. Trisolarans launch two of four Sophons towards the Earth at a speed that is close to light-speed used for stop the basic sciences of humans. The remaining two are used for communication.

text.headline: Sophons Arrive & Frontiers of Science Is Established
text.text:
Two Sophons launched by Trisolarans are arrival to the Earth. The basic sciences of humans is stopped.

In same year, the Frontiers of Science organization is established.

text.headline: The Beginning
text.text:
• Lots of theorists and physicists commit suicide.
  • Yang commits suicide after she knows her mother Ye's secret.
  • Wang Miao, a nanotechnologist, initially contacts the Frontiers of Science. He meets Shi Qiang for the first time; after, he is invited to the operation center.
  • A countdown is appeared on the photos Wang takes. Subsequently, it is projected onto the retina of Wang's eyes. Wang is so terrified. At this time, someone who belongs to the Frontiers of Science tells him to pause his experiment. After Wang paused it, the countdown in his retina is also paused and disappeared.
  • Wang plays the Three Body game. He realizes who is the enemy of the Earth.
  • Shi designs the operation Guzheng. The government attacks a converted oil tanker of ETO which is housing ETO's communications with Trisolaris. From this action, Earth's government directly learns the existence of Trisolaris.
  • Ye talks the cosmic sociology with Luo Ji. Ye dies of an illness.
  • Trisolarans and ETO's pursuit of Luo begins.

text.headline: PDC Is Established
text.text:
The United Nations announces that change the era to Crisis Era.

Planetary Denfense Council (PDC) is established.

Hibernation Technology is being used.

text.headline: PIA Is Established
text.text:
PDC Strategic Intelligence Agency (PIA) is established.

Staircase Program is launched.

The General Assembly of the United Nations adopts the No.117 resolution, announces that ecapism is illegal.

Wallfacer Project is launched. Frederick Tyler, Manuel Rey Diaz, Bill Hines, and Luo Ji are four wallfacers.

ETO appoints three wallbreakers to guess and break first three wallfacers' planning.

ETO attempts to assassinate Luo. It is failed.

text.headline: Stars Our Destination Project
text.text:
Stars Our Destination Project is launched.

Yun Tianming buys the star DX3906 (the realistic prototype may be HIP 80161), which is 286.5 light-year away from the sun.

Yun attends the Staircase Program. His brain is sent to the space.

Cheng Xin, as the liaison of the Staircase Program, uses Hibernation Technology to go to the future.

text.headline: Dark Forest Theory
text.text:
Luo understands the Dark Forest Theory. He sends a spell to the space, which is a cosmic broadcast announces the position of the star 187J3X1.

Luo is attacked by the gene weapon from ETO. He has to go to the future waiting for the treatment by Hibernation Technology.

text.headline: ETO Is Eliminated
text.text: ETO is finally eliminated by the government.

text.headline: 187J3X1 Is Destroyed
text.text: The star 187J3X1 is attacked by the Photoid, which is a dark forest attack from an unknown civilization.

text.headline: Earth Oberves the Attack
text.text:
The scientists on the Earth observe the attack of the star 187J3X1.

Luo's experiment is successfully finished.

text.headline: The Droplet
text.text:
Luo is revived, but he is unappreciated right now.

A Droplet launched by Trisolarans destroys almost entite space fleet of humans. Humans are still facing an unimaginable gap of technology between self and Trisolarans, just like 200 years ago.

Two spaceships escape the Solar System, they want to establish the civilization elsewhere.

Luo resumes his Wallfacer role.

Snow Project is launched; Luo is the responsible person.

text.headline: Dark Forest Deterrence
text.text: Luo completes the Dark Forest Deterrence. The Droplet and the fleet of Trisolarans have to retreat. Cisis Era finishes; Deterrence Era starts.
